topic: Experimental verification and quantification of oxygen-induced surface segregation of subsurface 3d atoms (Ni and Co) in Pt-3d-Pt(111) bimetallic systems: Methods, kinetics, and comparison with DFT predictions
QuestionEnglish: How do experimental techniques such as HREELS and AES verify and quantify the oxygen-induced surface segregation of subsurface 3d atoms (particularly Ni and Co) in Pt-3d-Pt(111) bimetallic systems, and how do the measured segregation kinetics and activation barriers compare with DFT predictions for these systems?
QuestionChinese: 高分辨率电子能量损失谱（HREELS）和俄歇电子能谱（AES）等实验技术如何验证和量化Pt-3d-Pt(111)双金属系统中亚表面3d原子（特别是Ni和Co）的氧诱导表面偏析，以及测得的偏析动力学和活化能障如何与这些系统的密度泛函理论（DFT）预测相比较？
